description:
When Nelson Andrews, star of the hit TV series “The Sparrow,“ becomes possessed by a Number Card, Yuma challenges him to a duel, putting Astral’s safety on the line!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Seigi no Oubanfurumai! Esper Robin Sanjou!!
The Grand Feast of Justice! Esper Robin Arrives!!
正義の大盤振る舞い! エスパー・ロビン参上!!
